articles.author: ldono
articles.title: Fraternity hazing deaths 2017
articles.description: Timothy Piazza, 19, of Readington Township, N.J., died after being fed 18 alcoholic drinks in less than 90 minutes at a Penn State fraternity, stumbling and severely injuring himself.

articles.title: Penn State fraternity faces underage drinking charges
